doc:
Specifies the definition of internal coordinates (IC) by SMARTS. A neline-separated list is expected, where ecah line defines a single IC according to the following syntax:
 SMARTS SMARTS [SMARTS [SMARTS]] TYPE
 where each SMARTS identifies an atom deginign the IC, and TYPE is a string among STR (for bond stretching), BND (for angle bending), TOR (for torsion), and OOP (for out-of-plane angle with the central atom being the one in 4th position).

tag: define settings of the VobModule's job output to analyze.
